alert.note: Alert for Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Northwest Beaverhead County; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 27 at 11:49PM MST until November 28 at 9:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. * WHERE...The Mountains of Southwestern Montana south of Interstate 90. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Northwest Beaverhead County; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains
